column4: any program you have could access your user data if you are the one running it
Would it be a good idea to create a separate user account to test it?
_theIdiotBox: Well my goal is to learn how to do it like a sysadmin would. So I want to make sure it could be usable for multiple users
i dont know what the preffered directories are for that sort of thing, but i usually but the directory in /usr/local/lib and an executable script in /usr/local/bin
